CreateLibrary.document: This example shows you how to create a media library.
CreateLibrary.title: Creating a Media Library

DeleteLibrary.document: This example shows you how to delete a media library.
DeleteLibrary.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1 
Host: smh.tencentcloudapi.com 
Content-Type: application/json 
X-TC-Action: DeleteLibrary 

{
    "LibraryId": "smh0q8nrvsg7t6y6"
}
DeleteLibrary.title: Deleting a Media Library

ModifyLibrary.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: smh.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyLibrary
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Remark": "New remark",
    "LibraryId": "smh1jjexrwwoa9ok",
    "LibraryExtension": {
        "EnableFileHistory": "true",
        "UseRecycleBin": "true"
    },
    "Name": "New name"
}
ModifyLibrary.title: Modifying a Media Library Configuration Item

SendSmsCode.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: smh.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: SendSmsCode
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Purpose": "BindSuperAdmin",
    "InstanceId": "n0v9tdme",
    "PhoneNumber": "18999999999"
}
SendSmsCode.title: Sending SMS Verification Code
